channel.title: Form Handling | Hugo Academic CV Theme

item.title: Survey Form
item.description:
A responsive survey form built with HTML and CSS that collects user feedback in a structured format. This project demonstrates the creation of forms, form validation, and responsive design techniques.

Key features include:

  • Multiple input types: text, radio buttons, checkboxes, and dropdowns
  • User-friendly layout with clear call-to-action buttons
  • Form validation to ensure proper data submission

This project helped me practice frontend web development skills while ensuring a seamless user experience on both desktop and mobile devices.
